structure.unit: Sec. 12-3062. - NOTICE TO OWNER OF IMPOUNDED ANIMAL.

law.catch_line: NOTICE TO OWNER OF IMPOUNDED ANIMAL.
law.text: Upon impounding an animal with an identification tag, the animal control warden shall cause a prompt and reasonable effort to be made to locate and notify the animal's owner. (Code 1959 , ยง4-36)
